item.title: Welcome to My Research Portfolio
item.description:
Welcome to my professional research website. This platform showcases my academic work, publications, and ongoing research projects.

Current Focus

I am currently working on several research initiatives:

  1. AI Semiconductor Valuation - Comprehensive analysis using GEE regression and Random Forest methodologies
  2. Precision Oncology - Exploring AlphaFold 3 applications in drug discovery
  3. Carbon Black Industry - Strategic optimization for high-value applications

Stay tuned for updates on publications and research findings.
